about.title: About Me
about.bio: Self-taught front-end developer, passionate about modern web development, with a solid academic background in mathematics, cryptography, and logic. My rigorous approach to problem-solving comes from my university experience, while my curiosity and creativity are reflected in my web projects. I have strong command of web languages (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript ES6+), along with in-depth knowledge of native CSS and DOM manipulation. My continuous learning has allowed me to progress rapidly in React, which I continue to improve through hands-on projects. With several components and complete projects already built, I am motivated, independent, persistent, and always ready to take on new challenges.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.text: Thanks for visiting my site, if you find me to be a good fit for your team then you will find me on :

projectItems.title: Landing Page
projectItems.description: A fully responsive and modern landing page built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

projectItems.title: Miltilingual Portfolio
projectItems.description: My personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring dark mode, responsive design, and reactive multilingual support.

projectItems.title: To-do App
projectItems.description: This to-do app was built using React Hooks such as useRef, useReducer, and useContext. It includes features like adding, editing, deleting tasks, and marking them as completed.

projectItems.title: e-commerce app
projectItems.description: An e-commerce product page built with React, featuring dynamic product fetching from the DummyJSON API, a functional shopping cart, and a clean, responsive UI.
